name: Skipper (itch) (MerryArcade)
description:
Stuff as many of the crates as you can on the boat, by turning and shuffling them around for the best fit. When a row is full it will be eliminated, and you'll get extra points. If the boat gets overloaded, it will sink.

On a computer, use the left and right arrow keys to move to the sides, the up key or space key to rotate, and the down key to place on the boat. Press the I key for info, the P key to play and the Return key to pause.

On a tablet or phone, swipe right or left to move, swipe up to rotate, and swipe down to place on the boat. Tap at the top to pause.
